page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT IN BLACKBURN
page.content: We asked the 34 children in our class to write down the jobs of their parents and any older brothers and sisters of working age. We thought it would be interesting to see how many went out to work. We found that 33 fathers went out to work, this was unusual considering that the unemployment rate in Blackburn is around 16%. 26 mothers went out to work, the rest were housewives. This number really surprised us, we didn't expect it to be so high. 8 families had brothers or sisters that worked.
